      • loadAllByFieldType

        java.util.List<Tfieldconfig> loadAllByFieldType(java.lang.Integer issueType,
                                              java.lang.Integer projectType,
                                              java.lang.Integer project,
                                              java.lang.Boolean isCustom)
        Gets all the TFieldConfigBean's from the TFieldConfig table for a given issueType, projectType, project and isCustom
        Parameters:
        issueType - include into filtering even if null
        projectType - include into filtering even if null
        project - include into filtering even if null
        isCustom - : is null: do not include into filtering is false: filter by system fields is true: filter by custom fields
        Returns:

      • loadAllByIssueType

        java.util.List<Tfieldconfig> loadAllByIssueType(java.lang.Integer issueType,
                                              java.lang.Integer projectType,
                                              java.lang.Integer project)
        Gets all the TFieldConfigBean's from the TFieldConfig table for issueType, projectType and project The issueType
        Parameters:
        issueType - can be null, in this case the result it is not filtered by issueType
        projectType - include into filtering even if null
        project - include into filtering even if null
        Returns:

      • loadAllByProjectType

        java.util.List<Tfieldconfig> loadAllByProjectType(java.lang.Integer projectType)
        Gets all the TFieldConfigBean's from the TFieldConfig table which have a projectType specified
        Parameters:
        projectType - if specified filter by projectType otherwise only be sure to not to be null (all projectType specific configurations)
        Returns:

      • loadAllByProject

        java.util.List<Tfieldconfig> loadAllByProject(java.lang.Integer project)
        Gets all the TFieldConfigBean's from the TFieldConfig table which have a project specified
        Parameters:
        project - if specified filter by project otherwise only be sure to not to be null (all project specific configurations)
        Returns:
